title: spot_light
description: The `spot_light` object adds a customizable spot-light to a GEM scene, allowing control over its position, color (via RGB list), and properties like linear attenuation, cone cutoff angle, and decay at edges. It can be adjusted with objects like `rotate` and includes a debug mode to visualize the light source. For frame-accurate rendering, its attributes should be set early in the `gemhead` order.
